main event: A circular object was sighted in the sky over Milford, Ohio on 23 July 1954.
interesting points: The sighting was reported around 1440 hours on the date in question., Many phone calls reported the strange circular object in the sky., The object was described as stationary and seen at a 45-degree elevation in the SSE direction., The report notes various conclusions including that the object could be a balloon or aircraft but was deemed probably astronomical., No further investigative action was anticipated unless requested by command.
sighted object: a silver circular shape in the sky
witness description: Numerous telephone reports received from the public.
